select
from weixiubaogao where bianhao = #{bianhao,jdbcType=VARCHAR} limit 0,1

select count(*) from weixiubaogao where 1=1 and bianhao like concat('%',#{bianhao,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') and shebeimingcheng like concat('%',#{shebeimingcheng,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') and qingkuangjianshu like concat('%',#{qingkuangjianshu,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') and weixiuyuanyin like concat('%',#{weixiuyuanyin,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') and weixiujieguo like concat('%',#{weixiujieguo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') and weixiuren like concat('%',#{weixiuren,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')

select from weixiubaogao where 1=1
and bianhao =#{bianhao}

select from weixiubaogao where 1=1 and bianhao like concat('%',#{bianhao,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') and shebeimingcheng like concat('%',#{shebeimingcheng,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') and qingkuangjianshu like concat('%',#{qingkuangjianshu,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') and weixiuyuanyin like concat('%',#{weixiuyuanyin,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') and weixiujieguo like concat('%',#{weixiujieguo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') and weixiuren like concat('%',#{weixiuren,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') order by id desc
limit #{pageno},#{pageSize}

update weixiubaogao
